mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(cafe_id, user_id, star, content) VALUES(#{cafe_id}, #{user_id}, #{star}, #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.cafe_id, r.user_id, u.user_name, r.star, r.content, r.updated_at, r.created_at FROM REVIEW r, USER u WHERE r.user_id=u.user_id AND r.cafe_id=#{cafe_id} AND r.isDeleted=0 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET isDeleted=1 WHERE review_id=#{review_id};
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.cafe_id, r.user_id, u.user_name, r.star, r.content, r.updated_at, r.created_at FROM REVIEW r, USER u WHERE r.user_id=u.user_id AND u.user_id=#{user_id} AND r.isDeleted=0 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMAGE(review_id, cafe_id, path) VALUES(#{review_id}, #{cafe_id}, #{path});
